snippet.title: Ghostbane Trailer
snippet.description:
What is GHOSTBANE?

You are Paranormal Hunters. Your mission is to identify and neutralize various types of ghosts that manifest in different locations. While you can try your luck alone, working in teams of 2-4 will be more effective. Solve the mysteries of the paranormal world using your equipment. Identify the types and beliefs of ghosts so that you can perform rituals to imprison them. Remember, teamwork and leveraging the strengths of each team member will shape your success. Are you ready, hunters?

Demo has been released.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2645490/Ghostbane/


Discord: https://discord.gg/9FVmtrRqae
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2645490/Ghostbane/
